contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=January 2013}} {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Leiderdorp |image_skyline=Netherlands, Zuid-Holland, Leiderdorp, Oude Rijn (1).JPG |image_flag = Leiderdorp flag.gif |flag_size = 120x100px |image_shield = Leiderdorp wapen.svg |shield_size = 120x100px |image_map = LocatieLeiderdorp.png |mapsize = 250px |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = NL |subdivision_type = Country |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[South Holland]] |area_footnotes = (2006) |area_total_km2 = 12.29 |area_land_km2 = 11.73 |area_water_km2 = 0.56 |population_as_of = 1 January, 2007 |population_note = Source: [[Statistics Netherlands|CBS]], [http://statline.cbs.nl/ Statline].</small> |settlement_type = Municipality |population_total = 26090 |population_density_km2 = 2224 |timezone = [[Central European Time|CET]] |utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 |latd = 52.15 |latNS = N |longd = 4.53 |longEW = E |website = [http://www.leiderdorp.nl www.leiderdorp.nl] }} '''Leiderdorp''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Leiderdorp.ogg}}) is a town and municipality in the western [[Netherlands]], in the province of [[South Holland]] near the city of [[Leiden]]. It had a population of 26,090 in 2007. The municipality covers an area of {{convert|12.29|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} of which {{convert|0.56|km2|sqmi|abbr=on}} is water. Leiderdorp has now become a suburb of the city of [[Leiden]], although the [[Oude Rijn]] (Old Rhine) river and the [[Zijl (river)|Zijl]] river separate the two. The [[HSL-Zuid]] [[high-speed rail]] line between [[Amsterdam]] and [[Brussels]] crosses Leiderdorp in a tunnel. It is one of the oldest towns in Zuid Holland province and was a base for the Spanish army in the [[Eighty Years' War]]. [[Šamorín]], in [[Slovakia]], is the [[Town twinning|twin town]] of Leiderdorp. == Notable people == * [[Armin van Buuren]], born December 25, 1976, lived in Leiderdorp, trance music producer and DJ. * [[Carice van Houten]], born September 5, 1976, lived in Leiderdorp, stage and film actress. * [[Dennis Leeflang]], born May 22, 1979, born in Leiderdorp, lived in Leiderdorp, drummer and music producer. * [[Daphne Groeneveld]], born December 24, 1994, born in Leiderdorp, model. ==Gallery== <gallery> File:Netherlands, Leiderdorp, map of 1867.png|Leiderdorp, map of 1867. File:Netherlands, Zuid-Holland, Leiderdorp, Oude Rijn (2).JPG|Town centre on the Old Rhine. File:Leiderdorp - Hoofdstraat 31.jpg|[[Rijksmonument|Listed]] farm in spring </gallery> ==External links== {{commons|Leiderdorp}} *{{Official website|http://www.leiderdorp.nl }} {{nl icon}} <!--Please note that not all directions need to be filled--> <!--Please note that preferably only neighboring municipalities or bodies of water should be used--> {{Geographic location |Centre = Leiderdorp |North = |Northeast = [[Kaag en Braassem]] |East = |Southeast = [[Rijnwoude]] |South = ''[[Oude Rijn (Utrecht and South Holland)|Oude Rijn]]''<br>[[Zoeterwoude]] |Southwest = |West = [[Leiden]] / ''[[Zijl]]'', ''[[Oude Rijn (Utrecht and South Holland)|Oude Rijn]]'' |Northwest = [[Teylingen]] }} {{South Holland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of South Holland]] [[Category:Populated places in South Holland]] {{SouthHolland-geo-stub}}
